mechanics.condition: Caster chooses one creature AND Creature is visible to caster AND Creature is within range
mechanics.outcome: Target begins a comic dance in place for the duration

mechanics.condition: Target is immune to the Charmed condition
mechanics.outcome: Target is immune to this spell
Target must use all its movement to dance without leaving its space

mechanics.trigger: While affected by Irresistible Dance AND Target makes a Dexterity saving throw
mechanics.condition: Target is affected by Irresistible Dance
mechanics.outcome: Target has disadvantage on the Dexterity saving throw

mechanics.trigger: While affected by Irresistible Dance AND Target makes an Attack Roll
mechanics.condition: Target is affected by Irresistible Dance
mechanics.outcome: Target has disadvantage on the Attack Roll

mechanics.trigger: While affected by Irresistible Dance AND Other creature makes an Attack Roll against Target
mechanics.condition: Target is affected by Irresistible Dance
mechanics.outcome: Attacker has advantage on the Attack Roll against Target
Target can use an action to make a Wisdom saving throw to regain control of itself

mechanics.trigger: Target makes a Wisdom saving throw as an action to end Irresistible Dance
mechanics.outcome: Irresistible Dance effect on Target ends

description_text: Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target begins a comic dance in place: shuffling, tapping its feet, and capering for the duration. Creatures that can't be charmed are immune to this spell.A dancing creature must use all its movement to dance without leaving its space and has disadvantage on dexterity saving throws and attack rolls. While the target is affected by this spell, other creatures have advantage on attack rolls against it. As an action, a dancing creature makes a wisdom saving throw to regain control of itself. On a successful save, the spell ends.
